description: A PURE naturals original - bulky, quick drying 100% Peruvian Yarn sourced from livestock in the Peruvian Highlands by indigenous herders and knitters in Peru - ideal for mountain cabin life and fall hiking in Canada. Rugged, warm and authentic.
name: PURE naturals 100% Natural Alpaca & Wool 1/2 Zip Sweater - Mens

specs.value: 60% 7 gauge ultra-warm alpaca yarn blended with 40% Peruvian high loft 24.5 micron merino
